section.header: annex iii labelling and package leaflet

particulars to appear on the outer packaging or, where there is noouter packaging, on the immediate packaging pegintron 50 micrograms powder and solvent for solution for injection – 1 pen, 1 injection needle and 2 cleansing swabs. 1. name of the medicinal product
section.p: pegintron 50 micrograms powder and solvent for solution for injection pre-filled penpeginterferon alfa-2b
one pegintron pre-filled pen contains a sufficient amount of peginterferon alfa-2b to provide50 micrograms in 0.5 ml of peginterferon alfa-2b when reconstituted as recommended.
excipients: disodium phosphate, anhydrous; sodium dihydrogen phosphate dihydrate, sucrose andpolysorbate 80. solvent: water for injections.
1 pen, 1 injection needle and 2 cleansing swabs50 micrograms/0.5 ml
subcutaneous useread the package leaflet before use.

one pegintron pre-filled pen contains a sufficient amount of peginterferon alfa-2b to provide150 micrograms in 0.5 ml of peginterferon alfa-2b when reconstituted as recommended.
excipients: disodium phosphate, anhydrous; sodium dihydrogen phosphate dihydrate, sucrose andpolysorbate 80. solvent: water for injections.
12 pens, 12 injection needles and 24 cleansing swabs150 micrograms/0.5 ml
subcutaneous useread the package leaflet before use.

section.header: 6.special warning that the medicinal product must be stored out of the reach and sight of children
section.p: keep out of the reach and sight of children.

section.header: 7.other special warning(s), if necessary 8. expiry date
section.p: exp
store at 2°c – 8°c (in a refrigerator).46

section.header: 10.special precautions for disposal of unused medicinal products or waste materials derived from such medicinal products, if appropriate
section.p: after injection of the dose, discard the pen in an appropriate container.

section.header: 11.name and address of the marketing authorisation holder
section.p: marketing authorisation holder: sp europe, 73, rue de stalle, b-1180 bruxelles, belgium
